Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Blue Sea Hotel Calas Marina in Benidorm, you'll be near the beach and convenient to La Cala Beach and Club de Golf Las Rejas. This hotel is within close proximity of Malpas Beach and Estadio Municipal Guillermo Amor.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 118 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Blue Sea Hotel Calas Marina, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is Noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Blue Sea Hotel Calas Marina, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Blue Sea Hotel Calas Marina in Benidorm, you'll be near the beach and convenient to La Cala Beach and Club de Golf Las Rejas. This hotel is within close proximity of Malpas Beach and Estadio Municipal Guillermo Amor.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

La Cala Beach - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Club de Golf Las Rejas - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Malpas Beach - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Estadio Municipal Guillermo Amor - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Placa del Castell - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Mediterranean Balcony - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Terra Mitica - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Benidorm City Hall - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Villaitana Golf Course - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Playa el Torres - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Benidorm Island - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Terra Natura - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Casino Mediterraneo Benidorm - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Cala del Tio Ximo Beach - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Benidorm Palace - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi

The preferred airport for Blue Sea Hotel Calas Marina is Alicante (ALC-Alicante Intl.) - 43.9 km / 27.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
